head.title: Read Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvNameShort}} Apps
head.description: Easily access and extract metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} files across {{EnvNameShort}}. Works with common formats like XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3.

header.title: Extract Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} Files
header.description: Extract metadata from a wide range of documents, images, audio & video formats using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}} API?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) lets you easily view, edit, add, remove, find, and manage metadata from images and documents. No external software needed! Extract details from various formats like PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, and more. Plus, it offers advanced features for working with metadata.

examples.comment_3: Extract all details from a file

steps.title: How to Extract Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvNameShort}} with {{ProdShortName}}

content.title: Easily extract metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} files within your {{EnvName}} applications using [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}). Here's how:
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} file you want to extract metadata from.
content.step_2: Use a filter to specify which details you want to extract.
content.step_3: Start the extraction process using the {{TextFindProperties}}.
content.step_4: Access the extracted details for your application's needs.

more_features.title: Find Hidden Metadata in Business Files with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Easily search for and manage hidden details (metadata) in sensitive documents with {{EnvName}} applications using the {{ProdShortName}} library.

feature_1.title: Powerful Metadata Search for {{EnvNameShort}}
feature_1.content: Boost your document processing in {{EnvName}} with {{ProdShortName}}. Find hidden details quickly and easily using our search tools.

feature_2.title: Precise Metadata Filtering
feature_2.content: Target specific data you need. Search by text, date, or use special patterns to find exactly what you're looking for.

feature_3.title: Efficient Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Use {{ProdShortName}} to manage the details (metadata) you find in {{EnvName}} files. Add, update, or remove details as needed, all within supported file formats.

code_1.title: Read E-Book Details ({{EnvName}} Example)
code_1.content: This code example shows how to access details specific to EPUB e-books.
code_1.comment_1: Load the EPUB file into the {{TextMetadata}} object.
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve all the built-in details from the EPUB file.
code_1.comment_3: Use the retrieved data for your application's needs.
